Room.Name: Avatar Boulevard/Netherworld Lane Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Avatar Boulevard and Netherworld Lane.
Room.LongDescription: Avatar Boulevard heads off to the north from here, bringing you to the west side of the Avatar Ruins. The Avatar Ruins are essentially just a set of boulders where the ancient Avatars used to study and practice to keep in prime mental, physical and spiritual shape. Netherworld Lane continues to run to the east and west.
